title: Claude Code Skill Rules Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Claude Code skills auto-activation system

skills.description: Map of skill names to skill configurations

autoInject.description: Allow automatic injection when detected (default: true). Set to false for meta-skills that should not inject content.

requiredSkills.description: Other skills that must be loaded before this one (dependency resolution)

injectionOrder.description: Order for dependency injection (0-100, lower loads first)

description.description: Clear description sent to AI for intent analysis. This is the PRIMARY detection mechanism - make it comprehensive and specific.

promptTriggers.description: Keyword triggers for detection (fallback mechanism for short prompts)

keywords.description: Keywords for substring matching (case-insensitive). Used as fallback when AI analysis is inconclusive or for prompts <10 words.

affinity.description: Names of complementary skills that should be auto-injected together (bidirectional relationship, max 2). Use skill names, not file paths.
